text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Horsegirls each have their own aptitudes for distances and track types.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Make sure you pay attention to that 
when creating your teams!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Also, as you field stronger and
stronger horsegirls, your team rank
will increase.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Raise strong girls, and raise your team
rank to the highest tiers! That's where
you get to show off your skills isn't
it, trainerâ™ª
